The pilot of the cargo plane that crashed in the Bermuda Triangle, 
Will on personal experience convinced that all scientific theories 
attempting to explain the frequent disappearances of aircraft and 
ships, this area is fundamentally wrong. As it turned out, the 
emissions of gas from the ocean depths, huge waves of wandering 
and low-frequency sounds innocent. The cause of all disasters - 
the invisible portal into a parallel universe. Finding himself 
in another world, Will meets with the same missing lame duck, 
who call themselves survivors.
